txt.en:
'Have they spotted me yet? I don't think so...good! They mustn't know the Ale Association is meddling, or else I fear there will be an all-out war between our two leagues.

'I have been sent on a mission to scout out what all the fuss is about at the Party Tree this autumn. It seems a new door is there, and I saw many hobbits go in...and few come out.

'Leave it to hobbits to get lost underground! This is a capital opportunity for us to scare them silly. You should go find them and scare them in any way you can think of.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Only one Haunted Burrow quest may be underway at a time.</rgb>

'That is a delightful story! It's too bad it has nothing to do with ale, but what can you do? There is a certain order of priorities when you join the Ale Association, you know. We want to take care of important matters first. Ale will always be there later.'
'Won't it be amusing to make the little, woolly-footed rascals squeak like frightened children? Ha-ha!'
The Ale Association -- A Game of Hobbit-harrying

R치thgeir, a member of the Ale Association, wishes to continue his association's legacy at the Haunted Burrow. This opportunity to play pranks on hobbits cannot be missed.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Play tricks to scare the hobbits in the Haunted Burrow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Scared hobbits are all over the Haunted Burrow, and surely there is a way to frighten them, because it is funny.\n\nYou should harry and harass the hobbits.
Tell R치thgeir of your hilarious escapades
R치thgeir, a mean sort of dwarf, can be found outside the Haunted Burrow, hiding behind some crates.\n\nYou should tell R치thgeir all about the little pranks you pulled.
